channel.title: How to take off whole pvp system?
channel.description: Ok, I have been doing some now in the source i got. Well, my problem is that i never find an place that is safe zone. i saw that problem when i made donator zone. not just that. the timer starts when attacking a monster and in that moment peoples can kill eachother. So please. if you know how to do. tell me, that would be nice of you :). Im really sick and tired on this "pvp world in 317" thing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 11:11:42 am[/size][hr]Do someone knows??????

item.title: How to take off whole pvp system?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:8, topic:325232”]You can create safe zones in certain areas. Code:
public boolean nonWild() {

if ((absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2) || (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)

So on and so forth…[/quote]

After you add what Mercifies informed you about you will need to declare what happens if the player is within that area soo you should have something maybe like this:

if(nonWild) { isInWildy = false; }

Something like that if you already do not have public boolean nonWild()…

Read full topic
item.source: How to take off whole pvp system?
